metadata.synopsis: Some goblins tormenting a gnome tied to a windmill are surprised when it stops rotating.

0.speaker: Fezzerk
0.text: Why's the spinnymajigger stopped? Get it moving again!
0.context: NodeContext: Impatient and suspicious.The windmill that the goblins are using to torment their captive has stopped - their leader wants his cronies to investigate and get the windmill working again.

1.speaker: Fezzerk
1.text: Our birdy flew away! Go check 'round back!
1.context: NodeContext: Surprised and suspicious.The windmill that the goblins are using to torment their captive accelerated and launched the gnome through the air.
